column4: Can anyone find vmware-server in adept?  I just had to reinstall from scratch and the repository manager is completely different now and I can't find that.  TIA!
doesn't vmware-server cost money? i don't think it's in the repositories...
There is a freebie version now.  Until something got screwed up and I had to do a wipe/reinstall I found it.
ah, yes the vmware version is just the player. google easyvmx to set up a vm.
